# Waruq

Waruq (Quechua waru basket or platform of a rope bridge to cross rivers / stony ground or place, precious stones, heaping, stone heap, -q a suffix,  Hispanicized spellings Huaroc, Huaroj) is an archaeological site in Peru. It is situated in the Hu√°nuco Region, Yarowilca Province, Chavinillo District
